derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: modern Latin, based on late Latin plasma 'mould, formation'

means.word_mean: 1. multinucleate sheet of cytoplasm characteristic of some stages of such organisms as slime molds
2. parasitic protozoan of the genus Plasmodium that causes malaria in humans
